title: Develop database architecture

description: Create unit and integration tests for all endpoints

title: Prepare September expense report
description: Collect all financial data, create a table, and generate a PDF report

description: Implement the frontend part of the profile with data editing capabilities

title: Design login form UI
subtaskDescription: Implement login form design with validation

title: Login button not working on mobile
description: Login button fails to respond on iOS Safari
bugDescription: Login button click event not firing on touch devices
stepsToReproduce:
1. Open app on iOS Safari
2. Enter credentials
3. Tap login button
4. Nothing happens

title: Memory leak in dashboard
description: Dashboard component not cleaning up event listeners
bugDescription: Memory consumption increases with each navigation to dashboard
stepsToReproduce:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Navigate away
3. Return to dashboard multiple times
4. Observe memory usage growth

title: User password reset functionality
description: Allow users to reset forgotten passwords
acceptanceCriteria: User can request password reset via email, receives reset link, can set new password, and gets confirmation email

title: Admin user management dashboard
description: Create admin interface for user management
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can view all users, filter by status, edit user roles, and deactivate accounts with confirmation

title: User authentication system
summary: Implementation of secure authentication system with login, registration, password reset, and 2FA

title: Admin panel development
summary: Build admin dashboard with user management, analytics, and system configuration
